creditline: Gift of Leo and Doris Hodroff
description: on cover: arms of Van Reverhorst surrounded by coronet and winged horse crest, within eight named armorials and flower scrolls; leaf and scroll designs on underside of cover and on sauceboat; two handles and two spouts
markings: on bottom of cover and sauceboat: two collector\'s stickers
object_name: Sauce tureen with arms of van Reverhorst
title: Sauce tureen with arms of van Reverhorst
